title: No hextech boxes for I dont know how long
body:
I have played many a game since my last hextech chest, apparently scoring an S rank does not give a chest now. Where they a limited thing, and now i have to buy them or am i meant to be getting hextech chests because i have not got one for quite a while. Plus it is not like i have not been playing, I have played quite a reasonable amount since they were released and have been in teams if not myself that achieved S rank.

Any Ideas?

replies.body:
Chests definitely aren't a temporary feature! I looked into your account a bit and I'm not seeing anything super strange at the moment.  I don't have information on your most recent of games yet, but looking at your account it seems that, for the most part, it's just no one in your premade is earning an S rank.

The only time I see anything different is a Leona game about a month ago in which you or your team earned an S rank, but you had already earned a chest on Leona.

If there's anything specific you think is weird, happy to look into it, but don't see anything right now.
